sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.PluginUtils</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>true</client_callable>
        <description>Utility functions for Plugins</description>
        <name>PluginUtils</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var PluginUtils = Class.create();
PluginUtils.prototype = Object.extendsObject(global.AbstractAjaxProcessor, {

    type: 'PluginUtils',

	isWsdVisitorPluginActive: function() {
		return this._isPluginActive('com.sn_wsd_visitor');
	},
	
    _isPluginActive: function(pluginName) {
        var pm = new GlidePluginManager();
        if (pm.isActive(pluginName)) {
            return true;
        }
        return false;
    },

	_isOshaPluginActive: function() {
		return this._isPluginActive('sn_hs_im_osha');
	}
});]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2023-02-21 14:06:51</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>17fad59377cd21102c408bfa7a5a9901</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>PluginUtils</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="">f27b42a72f373010f2bf532a2799b693</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="">f27b42a72f373010f2bf532a2799b693</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_17fad59377cd21102c408bfa7a5a9901</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2023-06-23 02:52:54</sys_updated_on>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
